title: Can ChatGPT Help With Bill Negotiations? We Put It to the Test
description: I tried using artificial intelligence to help me negotiate utility bills and bank fees.
content:
You could save a little spare change using AI-generated scripts to negotiate your bills. Antonio Solano/Getty Images

title: OpenAI picks Coursera’s Raghav Gupta to lead its education vertical in India
description: Separately, OpenAI announced the launch of OpenAI Learning Accelerator, an India-first initiative to train teachers on using artificial intelligence.
content:
OpenAI, the creator of AI chatbot ChatGPT, has appointed former Coursera MD Raghav Gupta to lead its education vertical in India and the Asia-Pacific. OpenAI is set to open its first India office in New Delhi.(Reuters)

title: AI plays an ever-bigger role on college campuses
description: While universities contemplate artificial intelligence use in the classroom, they are relying on the technology to cut down on operating costs and recoup staff’s time.
content:
The bot is not replacing staff in student services or IT at the fast-growing community college , but it will spare them from easy-to-answer queries that eat up their time, an administrator said.

title: How Inc. 5000 Companies Are Using AI for Sales
description: The CEOs at America's fastest-growing small businesses are overwhelmingly enthusiastic about artificial intelligence.
content:
As artificial intelligence grows increasingly mainstream, more and more companies are having to evaluate which of their processes can be handed over to machines and which still need a human touch.

title: This Bank Fired Workers and Replaced Them With AI. It Now Says That Was a Huge Mistake
description: Turns out, artificial intelligence may not always be as adept as some companies hope.
content:
Turns out, artificial intelligence may not always be as adept as some companies hope.

title: URI professor developing AI-driven robotics for people with disabilities
description: Reza Abiri is working to restore some independence for stroke survivors and people with physical disabilities through artificial intelligence and robotics.
content:
Abiri recently received a National Science Foundation CAREER Award, which builds on his own research developing both invasive and non-invasive AI-driven brain-machine interfaces to help stroke survivors and people with physical disabilities.

title: Cash-strapped council uses AI to determine if pensioners should go into care
description: A cash-strapped council is using artificial intelligence to help it decide if pensioners should go into care
content:
A cash-strapped council is using artificial intelligence to help it decide if pensioners should go into care.
Derby City Council has created an algorithm to help make recommendations to staff on the care it should offer to residents.

title: Protections needed to stop people believing chatbots are friends - expert

content:

title: Singapore studying broader ways to help workers 'bounce back' after job loss from AI, restructuring: DPM Gan
description: The government must pay attention to segments within the population that are at greater risk of being left behind as artificial intelligence changes the labour market, said Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong.
content:
SINGAPORE: With greater economic volatility ahead, the government is studying the need for "broader, system-level support" to help those involuntarily unemployed bounce back, Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong said on Monday (Aug 25).

title: IIT Council meet today: Credit transfer among IITs, scholarships, making JEE (A) less coaching-dependent on agenda
description: The council will also discuss necessary changes in curriculum, pedagogy, and assessments in response to the advent of Artificial Intelligence. | Education News
